name: fabber_dwi
author: Release Team
description: Fabber diffusion-weighted imaging tool for model-based analysis using forward models and different inference methods.

inputs.description: Directory for output files (including logfile)
inputs.name: Output Directory

inputs.description: Use this inference method
inputs.name: Inference Method

inputs.description: Use this forward model
inputs.name: Forward Model

inputs.description: Specify a single input data file
inputs.name: Input Data File

inputs.description: Print this usage method. If given with --method or --model, display relevant method/model usage information
inputs.name: Help Flag

inputs.description: List all known inference methods
inputs.name: List Methods Flag

inputs.description: List all known forward models
inputs.name: List Models Flag

inputs.description: List model parameters (requires model configuration options to be given)
inputs.name: List Parameters Flag

inputs.description: Describe model parameters (name, description, units) - requires model configuration options to be given. Note that not all models provide parameter descriptions
inputs.name: Describe Parameters Flag

inputs.description: List additional model outputs (requires model configuration options to be given)
inputs.name: List Outputs Flag

inputs.description: Evaluate the model. Set to name of output required or blank for default output. Requires model configuration options, --evaluate-params and --evaluate-nt
inputs.name: Evaluate Model

inputs.description: List of parameter values for evaluation
inputs.name: Evaluate Parameters

inputs.description: Number of time points for evaluation - must be consistent with model options where appropriate
inputs.name: Evaluate Number of Time Points

inputs.description: Instead of usual standard output, simply output a series of lines each giving progress as a percentage
inputs.name: Simple Output

inputs.description: If set, will overwrite existing output. If not set, new output directories will be created by appending '+' to the directory name
inputs.name: Overwrite Existing Output

inputs.description: Try to create a link to the most recent output directory with the prefix _latest
inputs.name: Link to Latest Output

inputs.description: Load models dynamically from the specified filename, which should be a DLL/shared library
inputs.name: Load Models

inputs.description: Specify multiple data files for n=1, 2, 3...
inputs.name: Additional Data Files

inputs.description: If multiple data files are specified, how they will be handled: concatenate = one after the other, interleave = first record from each file, then second, etc.
inputs.name: Data File Handling Order

inputs.description: Mask file. Inference will only be performed where mask value > 0
inputs.name: Mask File

inputs.description: List of masked time points, indexed from 1. These will be ignored in the parameter updates
inputs.name: Masked Time Points

inputs.description: 'Supplemental' timeseries data, required for some models
inputs.name: Supplemental Timeseries Data

inputs.description: Write the file paramnames.txt containing the names of the model parameters
inputs.name: Dump Parameter Names

inputs.description: Output the model prediction as a 4d volume
inputs.name: Save Model Fit

inputs.description: Output the residuals (difference between the data and the model prediction)
inputs.name: Save Residuals

inputs.description: Output any additional model-specific timeseries data
inputs.name: Save Model Extras

inputs.description: Output the final MVN distributions
inputs.name: Save MVN Distributions

inputs.description: Output the parameter means
inputs.name: Save Parameter Means

inputs.description: Output the parameter standard deviations
inputs.name: Save Parameter Standard Deviations

inputs.description: Output the parameter variances
inputs.name: Save Parameter Variances

inputs.description: Output the parameter Z stats
inputs.name: Save Parameter Zstats

inputs.description: Output the noise means. The noise distribution inferred is the precision of a Gaussian noise source
inputs.name: Save Noise Means

inputs.description: Output the noise standard deviations
inputs.name: Save Noise Standard Deviations

inputs.description: Output the free energy, if calculated
inputs.name: Save Free Energy

inputs.description: File containing additional options, one per line, in the same form as specified on the command line
inputs.name: Additional Options File

inputs.description: Output large amounts of debug information. ONLY USE WITH VERY SMALL NUMBERS OF VOXELS
inputs.name: Debug Flag

output-files.description: All outputs will be stored in the specified output directory
output-files.name: Output Files
